name: discogs-browser
title: Discogs Browser
description: It will search discogs.com for a music release information specified by Label ID, Barcode, Artist or Album name
author: gravisus

commands.name: search-catno
commands.title: Discogs search by catalog(release) number
commands.description: Search Discogs releases by catalog number

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: token
preferences.title: Discogs Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Your Discogs Personal Access Token. You can generate one at https://www.discogs.com/settings/developers
